content: Should we have standard Measures to capture the usage of FHIR?

I mean (for example)...
Would it make sense to have some common Measures defined and have IGs and / or servers capture some MeasureReports (voluntarily, anonymously...) about what is being actively used?
We can as test servers to do that voluntarily. Next to impossible to make it happen for production servers - which is where we'd really like the data
